markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Oracular Providence](/Feats.aspx?ID=6087) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=817" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 143 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
oracular clarity

</column>

---

Your mystery grants you access to deep reserves of truly miraculous [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579) power. You gain an additional 10th-rank spell slot.
name: Oracular Providence
